name: Froggert Breaks The Law
description:
After being imprisoned for a multitude of diabolical crimes, Froggert must escape frog prison, outrun the Law Frog and make his way home.

-Endless-

 In this mode you have a LIMITED TIME to press the button, if you don't react fast enough, the Law Frog will catch you!

-Timed-

In this mode, you have a LIMITED TIME to outrun the law frog, press the button quickly to get home as fast as you can!
